```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(flexdashboard)
library(viridis)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  fig.width = 6,
  fig.asp = .6,
  out.width = "90%"
)

theme_set(theme_bw() + theme(legend.position = "bottom"))
```

### Chart B: Distribution of Scores and Grades in Critically Flagged Restaurants

```{r, echo = FALSE}

critical_manhattan = 
  rest_inspec %>%
  select(-action) %>%
  filter(critical_flag == "Critical") %>%
  drop_na()
  

critical_manhattan

critical_manhattan %>%
  mutate(text_label = str_c("Name: ", dba, '\nScore: ', score)) %>%
  mutate(grade = forcats::fct_relevel(grade, c("A", "B", "C", "P", "Z", "Not Yet Graded"))) %>%
  plot_ly(
    x = ~grade,
    y = ~score,
    color = ~grade,
    type = "violin",
    text = ~text_label,
    alpha = 0.5
  ) 
  


  


```
